ValidationRule.description: This requires that Users fill in the Broker Fee Paid When and Broker Fee Paid by Whom fields when there is a Broker Fee
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Broker_Fees__c ) , Broker_Fees__c > 0, OR( ISPICKVAL( Broker_Fee_Paid_By_Whom__c , "N/A"), ISPICKVAL( Broker_Fee_Paid_When__c , "N/A") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Broker Fee Paid by Whom and Broker Fee Paid When must be entered and not "N/A" when there is a Broker Fee
